ModMetaData.name: Jobs of Opportunity (While You're Up)
ModMetaData.author: CodeOptimist
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla's opportunistic hauling, only better. Although patched for compatibility, the original While You're Up has not changed since added to vanilla back in 1.0. This mod is a direct replacement and significant improvement. Compatible with existing saves. Any load order. Haul to inventory support Advanced support for Mehni's Pick Up And Haul! Only items qualifying as opportunistic will be hauled; solves issue with spread-out stockpiles and unloading madness. (Dedicated haul jobs behave as normal, gathering as much as they can.) Skip when bleeding Don't take jobs of opportunity when bleeding. More hauling opportunities By default prefers the proximity requirements set by vanilla, but loosens them to find valid haulables. Adjustable for optimal performance. Optimize hauling to construction If and only if hauling a resource to storage would bring it closer to a blueprint, do that first. Haul jobs carry more materials, and with Pick Up And Haul, many more.
